Reviews.Title: Great Price and functionality.
Reviews.Author: DBroach
Reviews.Content: Sometimes freezes on me, but this is exactly the phone I wanted. I need a dual sim. I wanted a smaller phone - not a "phablet". It hooks into all my other Samsung devices. Very difficult to find accessories that fit to size since it is not that popular a phone and wish it could play music louder. But overall meets exactly my needs as advertised.

Reviews.Title: The best phone to who needs to use two sim cards at the same time
Reviews.Author: Andres Quintana
Reviews.Content: I can use the two sim cards at the same time. I can choose the line I want to use to make a call or I can cancel one of them. Very good speed into internet with 3G net and excellent with WiFi. The right size for business people, you can wear it in your pants, shirt or coat pocket. I just love itI got mine before, now I got a couple of them like a Christmas gift.

Reviews.Title: The item was sent in wrong color and with European adapater.
Reviews.Author: Javier
Reviews.Content: The item was sent in wrong color and with European adapater.. The item was returned, could not be use in US.
